flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=20>>20 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 20*300=$<<20*300=6000>>6000
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=250>>250 profit
So those added 250*2=$<<250*2=500>>500
So his total profit from everything was 6000+500+2000=$<<6000+500+2000=8500>>8500
So he made a profit of 8500-4000=$<<8500-4000=4500>>4500
#### 4500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
